title: Report matters on FGM immediately
content:
Report immediately to the police all those involved in the act of female genital mutilation and those who promote the act of female genital mutilation are also liable for an offence.

The police, local and cultural leaders should educate the community on the law governing FGM and the disadvantages thereto.

Affected individuals should contact organizations that combat FGM and are focused on the girl child for more information on steps to take and for support for victims.
